name: o9 Solutions
description: Better, faster planning and decision-making translates directly to better financial results for companies. But it means much more. Global supply chains are the largest consumers of the Earth’s resources. Better, faster planning and decision-making means enterprises are able to achieve their financial goals while using less of the Earth’s precious resources. Better, faster planning and decision-making also drives more transparency. It reduces organizational silos, empowers people, and increases productivity. This translates further into inspired employees who can better contribute to society. Our mission is to provide global companies with a game-changing planning platform to transform their supply chain, commercial, finance, and sustainability decision-making.
Headline: The knowledge powered analytics, planning and learning platform for next-generation global enterprises.
ShortDescription: Better, faster planning and decision-making translates directly to better financial results for companies.
enhanced_description: o9 Solutions provides a knowledge-powered analytics, planning, and learning platform designed for next-generation global enterprises. While its core mission is to transform supply chain, commercial, finance, and sustainability decision-making for better financial results and resource optimization, the platform also encompasses critical HR functionalities. It supports Total Rewards, Performance Management, and Employee Recognition programs, aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement. Specific features include work-life integration, social impact initiatives, and vacation and holiday management, all contributing to increased transparency, reduced organizational silos, empowered people, and enhanced overall productivity.
key_use_cases: Strategic planning and decision-making across supply chain, commercial, finance, and sustainability functions
Implementing and managing performance management systems
Deploying and administering employee recognition programs
competitive_advantages: Holistic planning capabilities across supply chain, commercial, finance, and sustainability
Focus on resource optimization and sustainability outcomes
Drives organizational transparency and reduces silos
Integrates HR-specific functionalities (Total Rewards, Performance, Recognition) with broader enterprise planning
roi_benefits: Achievement of financial goals while using fewer Earth's resources
